reviewText:
Serial naps for the wife and myself.
Charming and lovely protagonists but,...crushingly, stultifyingly BORING,
We purchase many Italian DVD's and this is by far the least valued of the lot.
Commesse, the Shopgirls is DULL and VAPID. Did I say it was BORING and DULL?
We gave it six trys to sit through but we kept dozing off.
on the plus side we are rather well rested, so that is one positive atribute.
Also it is DULL and BORING. (I may have said that).
